players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Alice was found dead last night. I investigated Bob and discovered he is the mafioso. We need to vote him out today to protect the town."
Diana: "Charlie, I'm a villager and I'm not sure about your claim. Alice was killed, but you're the only one who claims to have investigated Bob. How can we trust you?"
You: "Charlie, your quick accusation seems suspicious. Why reveal your investigation so soon without more evidence? Maybe you’re trying to mislead us."
Diana: "Charlie, I still need more information. Bob's point about your quick accusation is valid. If you're a detective, you should have more details or at least a clearer reason for your certainty."
You: "Charlie, your accusation feels rushed and convenient. If you truly investigated me, why not share more details to convince Diana? I think we need to be cautious before voting."

Charlie: "Bob is the only one who fits the profile of the mafioso since I investigated him last night. Delaying the vote gives him more chances to harm us. We must act now to save Diana and the town."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
